useCase.name: Manage Capabilities
useCase.description: As a DevOps Engineer or an Application Developer, I want to manage capabilities in the system.

preconditions.precondition: The system is running and accessible.

failureEndConditions.condition: There was an error in managing the capability.

useCase.trigger: Actions triggered by DevOps Engineer and Application Developer.

mainSequence.step: DevOps Engineer deploys a capability by calling the capability deploy endpoint.
DevOps Engineer removes a capability by calling the capability remove endpoint.
DevOps Engineer updates a capability by calling the capability update endpoint.
Application Developer develops a capability by calling the capability show endpoint.
